episode: My boyfriend asked me to help him clean up the shop and I saw that all kinds of passengers and hardware into different bins and the next time I saw it it was all mixed together. I felt like I wasted my time. It was very annoying.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I spent hours sorting and organizing fasteners and hardware for my boyfriend and the next time I saw them they were all mixed together again.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Oh no, that must be so frustrating! It's tough to see your hard work undone.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I was more annoyed than frustrated this kind of thing happens a lot when he insists I help him tidy up the shop.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really irritating! Maybe setting some boundaries could help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That sounds good but what kind of boundaries would be good for that situation?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Perhaps suggesting he takes on the organizing himself could help?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Believe me l have tried that but he is very persistent that he needs my help and stresses the fact that we are partners and need to work together.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds tough. Maybe a chat about balance and fairness could help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sadly that is his idea of balance and fairness he says I should not be offended that he has just changed his mind about how he wants things he says he's not undoing what I have done it just seems that way.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's tricky. Maybe a calm talk about compromise could help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That sounds good but what would the compromise be how would he be able to compromise changing his mind?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: He could try communicating changes before acting.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That really wouldn't be a compromise that would still leave me feeling all my hard work was for nothing because now it's going to all be moved kor redone.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How about deciding together before starting?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We do that but then soon after I finish he seems to change his mind about how he wants things and he has the most experience and we have agreed he is the one in charge.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds challenging. Maybe a discussion about respecting each otherâ€™s efforts could help.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He says he does respect my efforts and his changes aren't a reflection on me but every time I help I know it is pointless because he is just going to change it anyway.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe try focusing on tasks that won't be changed?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: He doesn't need or want my help with those that is why the whole thing is so annoying.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a tough spot. Maybe finding a new way to contribute could be a solution.
